set.name: ACT
set.longname: The Stage Presents: The Neverending Act

card.name: Wizard Role ACT
card.text: (A creature can only have one role attached to it.) Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Wizard creature with base power and toughness 2/2 and has prowess.
card.reverse_related: A Tale of the Boastful Sailor

card.name: Cleric Role ACT
card.text: (A creature can only have one role attached to it.) Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Cleric creature with base power and toughness 2/2 and has lifelink.

card.name: Scout Role ACT
card.text: (A creature can only have one role attached to it.) Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Scout creature with base power and toughness 2/3 and has vigilance.

card.name: Warlock Role ACT
card.text: (A creature can only have one role attached to it.) Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Warlock creature with base power and toughness 2/1 and has flying.
card.reverse_related: A Tale of the Boastful Sailor

card.name: Warrior Role ACT
card.text: (A creature can only have one role attached to it.) Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Warrior creature with base power and toughness 3/2 and has trample.

card.name: Construct Actor ACT
card.reverse_related: A Tale of the Boastful Sailor
The Rejection of the Fair Prince

card.name: Seraph of the Stage
card.text: Flying Whenever you cycle Seraph of the Stage or it attacks, audition for white. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.) Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Grand Historian
card.text: Vigilance Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, you may return a non-Saga card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mourning Lady Faye
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Grasp of the Stageless
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each counter on permanents you control. Trample {G}{G}, Remove ten counters from among permanents you control, and exile Grasp of the Stageless from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of Grasp of the Stageless. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Prop Custodian
card.text: Whenever Prop Custodian becomes the target of a spell or becomes enchanted for the first time each turn, audition for white. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Off-Set Rumormonger
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, note its colors. At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to X target creatures get +2/+0 and gain menace until end of turn, where X is the number of colors noted with Off-Set Rumormonger.

card.name: Steal the Show
card.text: Create a 3/3 black Demon Horror creature token. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Skyward Dreamers
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Skyward Dreamers unless you remove a counter from a permanent you control.

card.name: Encouraging Bulwark
card.text: Whenever Encouraging Bulwark attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that has counters on it or is enchanted.

card.name: Wayward Bloodseeker
card.text: When Wayward Bloodseeker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. When you do, Wayward Bloodseeker deals damage to any target equal to the number of permanents you control with counters on them.

card.name: Xiyue Firelighters
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Minnows Accomplice
card.text: {2}{U}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one. Activate only as a sorcery. • If a lore counter was removed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Minnow's Accomplice. • If a +1/+1 counter was removed this way, draw a card.

card.name: Timeless Rehearsal
card.text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Strikebreaker
card.text: You may have Strikebreaker enter the battlefield as a copy of a non-Aura enchantment you control, except it's a 2/2 Construct Actor creature in addition to its types.

card.name: Dreadful Gorgon
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Dreadful Gorgon attacks, target attacking creature with lesser power gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Verdant Curtain Mascot
card.text: When Verdant Curtain Mascot enters the battlefield, choose one — • You gain 2 life. • Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Banished Prophet
card.text: When Banished Prophet enters the battlefield, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Unraveller of Mysteries
card.text: Flying When Unraveller of Mysteries enters the battlefield, mill two cards.

card.name: Dramatic Understudy
card.text: Prowess At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Prop Work
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, audition for green. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Warrior Role giving 3/2 and trample. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Jerrolds Descent
card.text: Audition for green, then audition for green. (To audition for green, create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a green Role Aura token on a creature you control, which can be 2/3 Scout with vigilance or a 3/2 Warrior with trample.)

card.name: Tailor of Terror
card.text: Haste Whenever Tailor of Terror attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Tailor of Terror.

card.name: Ivory Curtain Producer
card.text: Whenever Ivory Curtain Producer attacks, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it's enchanted, create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.

card.name: Lovely Duet
card.text: Up to two target creature can't block this turn. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: In the Nick of Time
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Apprehensive Slinger
card.text: Whenever Apprehensive ‘Slinger deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Cordial Ticketmaster
card.text: Reach When Cordial Ticketmaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Valiant Instructor
card.text: Flying When Valiant Instructor enters the battlefield, you return up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Astute Sceneweaver
card.text: When Astute Sceneweaver enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Lead Athlete
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Whenever you cast a spell that targets Lead Athlete or it becomes enchanted by a Role, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: The Monsters Attack
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Creatures you control with counters on them gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Verdant Curtain Naturalist
card.text: When Verdant Curtain Naturalist enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Crocheted Buddy
card.text: Trample Whenever Crocheted Buddy attacks, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it's enchanted, create a colorless 1/1 Construct Actor creature token.

card.name: Shattered Reflection
card.text: Discard a card, then draw a card. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Bedrock of Tales
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}: Put a lore counter on a Saga you control.

card.name: Castigate
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

card.name: Salvage the Stitchings
card.text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: On the Case
card.text: Proliferate (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.) Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Exuberant Snowmage
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you control an enchantment.

card.name: Brooding Replacement
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brooding Replacement.

card.name: Scathing Critics
card.text: Whenever Scathing Critics deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Crescent Crasher
card.text: Whenever Crescent Crasher attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

card.name: Overconfident Batter
card.text: When Overconfident Batter dies, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it's enchanted, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Backstage Broken
card.text: When Backstage Broken enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Actor creature token. Whenever a token you control leaves the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Thespians Page
card.text: When Thespian's Page enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Young Soulspeaker
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Performers of Purpose
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Performers of Purpose has first strike. When Performers of Purpose enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Actor creature token.

card.name: Marionette Phantom
card.text: When Marionette Phantom enters the battlefield, choose one — • Draw a card. • Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Bigroot Valley
card.text: Bigroot Valley enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Erupting Territory
card.text: Erupting Territory enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Gloomtide Gulf
card.text: Gloomtide Gulf enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Sculpted Observatory
card.text: Sculpted Observatory enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Peaceful Passage
card.text: Peaceful Passage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Caustic Mangrove
card.text: Caustic Mangrove enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Hazy Summits
card.text: Hazy Summits enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Somber Meadow
card.text: Somber Meadow enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Twisting Fissure
card.text: Twisting Fissure enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Lush Coast
card.text: Lush Coast enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Frostpoint Caldera
card.text: Frostpoint Caldera enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Boneyard Pass
card.text: Boneyard Pass enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Autumnal Boscage
card.text: Autumnal Boscage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Thawing Valley
card.text: Thawing Valley enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Molten Mire
card.text: Molten Mire enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Waterfront Market
card.text: Waterfront Market enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Spinerock Canyon
card.text: Spinerock Canyon enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Whispering Canal
card.text: Whispering Canal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Basin Fortress
card.text: Basin Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic land. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Traveling Ticketmaster
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant, sorcery, or enchantment spell from your graveyard as long as it targets a creature you control.

card.name: Closing-Act Abomination
card.text: Trample You may spend black and green mana as though it were mana of any color. Whenever Closing-Act Abomination attacks, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of colors of cards in your graveyard. Put up to one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Rambunctious Afterparty
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a party counter on Rambunctious Afterparty. Then Rambunctious Afterparty deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of party counters on Rambunctious Afterparty.

card.name: Hollow Queen
card.text: Hollow Queen can't be blocked by tokens. Whenever Hollow Queen deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Strawhood Harvested
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put your choice of a +1/+1 counter, a trample counter, or a haste counter on it.

card.name: The Rejection of the Fair Prince
The Tragedy of Fruits and Fanfare
Price of Performance
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Abominable Auteur
card.text: Haste Whenever Abominable Auteur attacks, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If its mana value was 1 or less, it enters tapped and attacking.

card.name: Leads Dont Die
card.text: When Leads Don't Die enters the battlefield, mill four cards and you gain 4 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile X cards from your graveyard and sacrifice Leads Don't Die. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Perfect the Models
card.text: Perfect the Models deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. You may play an additional land this turn. {5}{B}{R}{G}, Exile Perfect the Models from your graveyard: Create three 3/3 black Demon Horror creature tokens. They gain haste and indestructible until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Main Role Maiden
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a Treasure token. If that spell's mana value is 6 or greater, draw a card. If that spell's mana value is 8 or greater, Main Role Maiden deals 4 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Lapinized Caster
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, choose one — • Create a tapped Treasure token. • Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. • Create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.

card.name: Dulled Ghost
card.text: Dulled Ghost can't be blocked by creatures with less power than toughness. At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. If that permanent was tapped, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Percys Proclaimer
card.text: Green creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Red creatures you control have "{1}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player." White creatures you control have "{2}, {T}: Tap target nonland permanent."

card.name: Mindscape Ripper
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn. • Draw a card. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Brutal Director
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may reveal it. If you do and it's a nonland card, you may cast a copy of it. If you don't cast a copy of the card, Brutal Director deals 2 damage to any target. (You still pay the costs of the copied card.)

card.name: Ivory Curtain Litigator
card.text: If an enchanted permanent you control would leave the battlefield, instead destroy one of the Auras attached to it, then that permanent phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Around the Plane in Three Days
A Song of Sleet and Hellfire
Scaled Outburst
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Arrive, Surrounded by Petals
card.text: Enchant land When Arrive, Surrounded by Petals enters the battlefield, audition for green. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Warrior Role giving 3/2 and trample. Roles replace older ones.) Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Leading Clergy
card.text: Whenever Leading Clergy attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, audition for white. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Backstage Prompter
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Backstage Prompter deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: ACT Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Collapsing Frame
card.text: When Collapsing Frame enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Collapsing Frame: Draw a card.

card.name: The Grand Plot
card.text: When The Grand Plot enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three Saga cards with different names with mana value X or less, exile them, then shuffle. The Grand Plot has all chapter abilities of cards exiled with it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a lore counter on The Grand Plot. When you do, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Recoil in Fear
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

card.name: Retire
card.text: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Rip Apart
card.text: Choose one — • Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Assemble the Heroes
card.text: Create three 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature tokens.

card.name: Take Back the Stage
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Opulent Reprise
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Critical Acclaim
card.text: You gain 2 life and draw two cards.

card.name: Cacophonous Demon
card.text: Trample Whenever Cacophonous Demon deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. Whenever a creature deals damage to you, tap that creature. It becomes an enchantment in addition to its other types.

card.name: Host of the Celebration
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, any number of target creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage equal to that creature's mana value to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.

card.name: Jerrold, Fugitive
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Jerrold, Fugitive or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if you cast it, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with lesser mana value by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost. Exile that card instead of putting it anywhere else as it resolves.

card.name: Marva of Endless Inspiration
card.text: Indestructible Marva of Endless Inspiration can't attack or block unless you've cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater this turn. At the beginning of your end step, return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a land card, return it to the battlefield instead.

card.name: Performer King
card.text: First strike Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources with greater mana value. {2}{W}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token. Put a vigilance counter on it.

card.name: Prop Recycling
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Prop Recycling to its owner's graveyard. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with Prop Recycling.

card.name: Reflective Stalker
card.text: As Reflective Stalker enters the battlefield, choose a noncreature card name. When Reflective Stalker enters the battlefield, if it was cast, create a token that's a copy of it. Spells your opponents cast with the chosen name cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Remake the Cast
card.text: Creatures you control get -3/-3. Whenever a creature you control dies, put a soul counter on Remake the Cast. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each soul counter on Remake the Cast.

card.name: Soulwrought Songster
card.text: Prowess, trample During your turn, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost plus pay life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Douglass, Star of the Show
card.text: Double strike, trample Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you put a lore counter on a Saga you control, Douglass, Star of the Show gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Jeffery, Stage Manager
card.text: Once each turn, when Jeffery enters the battlefield or you create an Aura token, you may create Lead Role attached to target creature you control, an Aura token that's all colors with "Enchanted creature is a 5/5 creature with all creature types and flying, trample, lifelink, prowess, and vigilance." Whenever an enchanted creature you control attacks, draw a card.

card.name: Hope Spot
card.text: Audition for white. If you enchant a creature this way, untap it. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Powerful Distraction
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Runaway Princess
card.text: When Runaway Princess dies, audition for white. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Second-Stage Actress
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Second-Stage Actress has first strike. When Second-Stage Actress enters the battlefield, audition for white. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)

card.name: Conflict Capturer
card.text: Vigilance Conflict Capturer gets +2/+0 as long as a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Engrossed in the Tale
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as you control a Saga. When Engrossed in the Tale enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Engrossed in the Tale leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Expendable Victim
card.text: Vigilance When Expendable Victim dies, create a 1/1 colorless Actor creature token.

card.name: Mourners of Mervin
card.text: When Mourners of Mervin enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature or enchantment. If you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Spoiled Prince
card.text: When Spoiled Prince enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control.

card.name: Unwrite
card.text: Choose one — • Unwrite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Percys Messenger
card.text: Flying When Percy's Messenger enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. You may put a lore counter on a Saga you control.

card.name: Tuesdays First Victim
card.text: Prowess When Tuesday's First Victim dies, audition for blue. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)

card.name: Crafty Escape
card.text: Exile up to two target permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control. Audition for blue. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)

card.name: Intellectual Critic
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, scry 2.

card.name: Newswright
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, audition for blue. (Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)

card.name: Inspect the Plot
card.text: Draw a card. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: Tire Out
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've cast another spell this turn. Enchant creature When Tire Out enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Cerulean Curtain Treasurer
card.text: Flying When Cerulean Curtain Treasurer enters the battlefield, audition for blue, then audition for blue again. (To audition for blue, create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The blue Roles are a 2/2 Wizard with prowess and a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)

card.name: Performer of Winds
card.text: Performer of Winds can't be blocked. When Performer of Winds enters the battlefield, remove a counter from up to one target permanent you control.

card.name: From Curtains to Chills
card.text: Tap up to one target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it. Compose (Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with "r{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.")

card.name: The Lead Falls Short
